## For Contributors

If you'd like to fix this bug:

1. Comment on this issue to claim it
2. Create a branch: `fix/bug-name`
3. Use GitHub Copilot to help diagnose and fix
4. Submit a PR with before/after screenshots

See [CONTRIBUTING.md](../../CONTRIBUTING.md) for details.
